name: TAROTICA VOO DOO
description: In development since 1993, TAROTICA VOO DOO is an uncategorized Japanese adventure game with fully hand-drawn animation. Fight monsters and solve puzzles to cook dinner and save the family before the airplane crashes into their haunted mansion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 10 Processor: Intel Memory: 10 MB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
